description: New Zuni; Double strand of small silver beads; (first 10 beads are single); 6 clusters (each side of naja) of 8 \'Dewdrop\' turquoise each cluster set on pierced extension with 3-pronged squash blossom and button form; naja with twisted wire; 2 rows of sontes, silver drops; 134 stones, string with silver clasp. (serrated bezels, Villa Grove turquoises)  J.#428, Cat.#434.
title: Necklace
